notes_display: 7% Ag, Analysis by A.A. Gordus, University of Michigan 1974, by Neutron activation of streak
issue_obverse_figure_description_s: crown cap edged with triple  pearls, star in the center of lateral field, surrounded by zigzag design, one outer row of pearl; diadem, ribbed diadem ribbons; cheek-flaps; tunica with one cross-like device; row of pearls on neck-cutout; dotted border
issue_reverse_figure_description_s: base consisting of two elements; round altar shaft; four altar slabs; altar flames depicted with vertical strokes; to the left and right mushroom-shaped bases supporting lion-paw structures; below left and right edge of altar table pendent diadem ribbon; dotted border
